label: ⛏️ Conflict Minerals
definition: Company uses minerals (tin, tantalum, tungsten, gold) sourced from conflict regions without adequate supply chain verification.

criteria.description: Products contain 3TG minerals (tin, tantalum, tungsten, gold)
Supply chain traced to conflict-affected regions (DRC, etc.)

counterCriteria: Comprehensive due diligence and third-party auditing
